landing.vision_heading: Dear Agent, 60% Dividend, You're the owner
landing.vision_description: Thank you for your support of BAJI72! To thank you for your hard work and dedication, we've prepared exclusive rewards and benefits for you.
landing.materials_heading: Helping you quickly recruit agents, attract players, and improve conversions
landing.materials_description: Earn up to 60% of the profits generated by your referred clients. Generous rewards!

about.heading: Easy withdrawals, no wagering requirements!
about.description1: Agent rank adjusts based on performance. Ensure your promotion is active to maintain a higher rank and earn higher commissions!
about.description2: After upgrading, your rank will not be downgraded.
about.description3: Agent rank promotion requirements are subject to change based on actual operating conditions. Please refer to website announcements for details.

analyze.heading: Agent recruitment and sharing
analyze.description: A clear and friendly profit-sharing system and on-boarding tools help agents realize profits quickly.

whyus.heading: Whether you are a YouTuber with followers, own a website, or have SEO skills, you can choose to work with us and grow together. If you don’t have any related skills, you can still reach out to us — we will teach you what you need to know and help you on your way to becoming a billionaire.

footer.description: If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, you can contact us through the following channels to ensure your inquiries are effectively resolved.

about_page.company_description2: Your Bonus = Profit × 60% (Commission percentage increases based on agent level)
about_page.mission_description: Suppose you are a Level D agent and a client deposits 10 million and withdraws 6 million. Your profit is calculated as follows:
about_page.mission_description2: Total Profit: 4 million - 200,000 (Bonus) - 800,000 (20% Operating Cost) = 3 million
about_page.vision_description: In addition to client loss dividends, you will also receive the following rewards:
about_page.vision_description2: _You will receive a bonus of 108 for each qualified member you refer.
about_page.vision_description3: (Qualifying requirement: Subordinates must deposit 100 and bet 1,000 to qualify.)
about_page.vision_description5: A total of 0.45%, distributed as follows:
about_page.vision_description9: A total of 0.45%. Regardless of whether your clients win or lose, you will receive a bonus based on their betting amount.
about_page.vision_description11: _Receive an additional bonus by inviting a certain number of members!
about_page.vision_description13: _Recommend 5 or more and receive a 50 RMB reward
about_page.vision_description14: _Recommend 10 or more and receive a 100 RMB reward
about_page.vision_description16: _Each time your subordinate deposits 100 RMB, you'll receive a 1% commission.
about_page.vision_description17: Easily promote and earn generous rewards. Grow with us and share in the platform's benefits!

services.heading: FAQ
services.description: BAJI72 is one of the world’s most renowned online gambling operators, offering a range of exciting and entertaining games including live casino, chess, slot games, fishing, lottery and even sports betting

list.heading: How long does it take for withdrawals to arrive?
list.description: Daily/weekly settlement is usually optional, and Tether usually settles within 1-2 business days.

list.heading: How to obtain promotional materials?
list.description: Log in to the agent backend to download exclusive posters, short videos and landing page links.

list.heading: What countries/languages ​​are supported?
list.description: The default languages ​​are Chinese, English and Nepali, which can be expanded as needed.
